embeddedItem.name: Enhancement Paste: Physical
embeddedItem.desc: Upon use, increases Physical DMG of all allies by <nobr>24%</nobr> for the next battle.
embeddedItem.lore:
A cream made from a mixture of Path materials and other things.
Apply it to the right weapon to boost combat effectiveness.

"Half the effort, double the result."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

42979.name: Recipe: Enhancement Paste: Physical
42979.desc: A simple equation. When entered into the Synthesizer, it will unlock a new recipe.

71948.name: Metal
71948.lore:
A substance abundant in planets' crust and the ocean.
Very useful, very handy.

"I've been to a planet where the locals consume metals to get superpowers. Please don't do that at home, as most metals are not digestible by humans."
comeFrom: Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station

155955.name: Preservation Construction Material
155955.lore:
Construction materials that seem to possess the power of the Preservation.
When mixed with water it forms a paste, when exposed to air it turns rock-hard.
Please do not use together with Solid Water.

"I regret to say that Intelligentsia Guild's research on the material used to build the Subspace Crystalline Barrier by Amber Lord still needs time to reveal its nature."
"I'm sure it's not cement — am I right, Taravan?"
comeFrom: Corridor of Fading Echoes: Everwinter Shadewalkers or other enemies

557157.name: Meteoric Alloy
557157.lore:
Resilient meteoric ironsand.
Its tenacity is far superior to solid boulders.

"Let's grab as much as we can. Qlipoth will need them."
"I have no idea whether the Aeon need them or not. All I know is that the IPC will pay big bucks for them."
comeFrom: Robot Settlement: Automatons or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI
